main.name: Srushti Shah
main.description: Coding, Books and Music are my survival assests.
main.bio: Welcome to my portfolio website! I am a student of Information and Communication Technology pursuing my Bachelors of Engineering in Ahmedabad, India. I have been learning to code since Grade 11 and know various programming languages like C, C++, JavaScript, PHP and Python. I have also learned and practised on Frontend Web Development using basics of HTML, CSS and Bootstrap. I am now working on advanicing my Frontend Web Development skills using React, and learning Backend Web Development using NodeJS. Currently I am an internship trainee at Verzeo in Artificial Intelligence. You can call me a real nerd, as I am always ready to code or read a book.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to know more about me and get updates about my progress!

work.title: Back-End Web Developer
work.description: This is a startup working on the welfare and adoption of pets and requires a user-friendly, functional website for the same. My duties are to add the functions to this website and make it dynamic. I will be using NodeJS and ExpressJS for the same.

work.title: Back-End Web Developer
work.description: This startup is working for the young generation of India and as its back-end developer, I am working on making its website functional, dynamic and easy to use.
